  • Method Details

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation by creating and submitting VendorRunnable and CustomerRunnable tasks. Configures the simulation using the configuration service.

    • stopSimulation

      public void stopSimulation()
      Stops the simulation by setting the stop flag and shutting down the executor service.
